Resume

Operations Management & Information Systems Manager · Inventory Control · Logistics & Supply Chain

Professional Summary

Experienced Operations Management and Information Systems Manager and Inventory Control specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the logistics and supply chain industry and information systems. Skilled in operations management, analytical problem-solving, warehouse operations, information systems, and project management. Seeking a challenging role where I can contribute to operational excellence and continuous improvement.

Professional Experience

FM Global Logistics (M) Sdn. Bhd.

Operation Management Information Systems & Inventory Control – Senior Manager
Port Klang, MY
2011 – Present
  • Lead end-to-end project management, from initial proposal and budgeting to delivery, post-implementation review, and handover, ensuring projects for new and existing clients are completed successfully.
  • Conduct business requirements studies and collaborate with vendors to develop solutions using INFOR SCM WMS, while supporting the technical team in system design and development.
  • Manage project resources to meet key milestones on schedule, identify and mitigate project risks, and incorporate lean methodologies to enhance productivity and efficiency throughout the project lifecycle.
  • Maintain the WMS competency center to provide training and user support, oversee inventory control through regular cycle counts and reconciliations, and ensure WMS servers achieve 99.9% uptime.
  • Plan, monitor, and control application databases, backup systems, and Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) project management to guarantee reliable, uninterrupted system performance and data availability.

Operation Management Information Systems – Senior Supervisor
Shah Alam, MY
2009 – 2011
  • Analyzed, designed, and implemented IT systems such as Exceed WMS, SAP, and Hyperion Brio Reporting Tools to enhance the efficiency of daily logistics and warehouse operations.
  • Oversaw and coordinated IT projects from start to finish, including gathering functional business requirements, conducting unit testing, facilitating data migration, and managing go-live implementations.
  • Managed customer service and data entry teams to support operational goals while providing comprehensive training to users on WMS and reporting tools.
  • Oversaw inventory control and monitoring to maintain accurate records and ensure that support services met defined Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
  • Developed, implemented, and routinely tested the Business Continuity Plan with operational teams to guarantee smooth and uninterrupted operations during critical situations or system outages.

Senior Shipping and Logistics Executive
Kuala Lumpur, MY
2007 – 2009
  • Provided specialized support for international relocations, managing logistics to ensure a smooth transition for clients moving across borders.

  • Acted as the main point of contact with forwarding agents and handled customs and immigration procedures, maintaining seamless coordination across the UK, Australia, New Zealand, South Africa, the USA, Europe, and Southeast Asia to ensure compliance and efficient moves.
